channel.title: What is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix?
channel.description:
Hello. My task is to run Whonix so my ISP both shouldn't find out the fact that I use Tor and my connection should be as fast as possible. If you have a private VPN on your own VPS, what is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix? 1. Computer -> VPN -> TOR (obfs4) 2. Computer -> VPN -> TOR (direct) 3. Computer - TOR (obfs4)
So is just using obfs4 bridges generally enough to hide the fact that I use Tor or VPN before Tor is better?

item.title: What is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix?

item.description:

Prevent the Internet Service Provider from discovering you are a Tor user.

item.title: What is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix?
item.dc:creator: helpmeplzz
item.description:
Hello. My task is to run Whonix so my ISP both shouldn’t find out the fact that I use Tor and my connection should be as fast as possible. If you have a private VPN on your own VPS, what is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix?

  1. Computer -> VPN -> TOR (obfs4)
  2. Computer -> VPN -> TOR (direct)
  3. Computer - TOR (obfs4)

So is just using obfs4 bridges generally enough to hide the fact that I use Tor or VPN before Tor is better?

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most preferable way to connect to Whonix?
